casebody.data:
Deanna Ramey MULL et vir Guy Andrew Mull, Jr., Plaintiffs,
v.
Lloyd V. EUBANKS, Individually, Jennifer Herzog, As Trustee for Citifinancial Services, Inc. by and through its Registered Agent for Service of Process, CT Corporation System Services, Inc., Defendants. No. COA15-204. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Sept. 15, 2015.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Dismissed.
